Albums list

Post item is loading....

import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import {Album} from "../models"; import {ALBUMS} from "../fake-db"; import { AlbumService } from '../album.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-albums', templateUrl: './albums.component.html', styleUrls: ['./albums.component.css'] }) export class AlbumsComponent { albums: Album[]; loaded: boolean; constructor(private albumService: AlbumService) { this.albums = []; this.loaded = true; } ngOnInit(): void { // this.albums = ALBUMS; // this.getAlbums(); this.loaded = false; this.albumService.getAlbums().subscribe((albums) => { this.albums = albums; this.loaded = true; }) } removeAlbum(idx: number) { this.albums = this.albums.filter((x) => x.id !== idx); } }
